summary.span: 提供解譯效能計數器資料的公用程式函式集。

span.span: Provides a set of utility functions for interpreting performance counter data.

summary.span: 計算未經處理計數器樣本的已計算值。

span.span: Computes the calculated value of a raw counter sample.

param.name: newSample
param.span: ，表示最近系統已使用的樣本。

span.span: A that indicates the most recent sample the system has taken.

summary.span: 計算單一未經處理計數器樣本的已計算值。

span.span: Computes the calculated value of a single raw counter sample.

returns.span: 效能計數器已計算值的浮點表示。

span.span: A floating-point representation of the performance counter's calculated value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法多載會傳回只針對效能計數器有意義的結果的下列:The method overload returns meaningful results only for performance counters of the following : - - - - - 對於其他計數器型別，這個多載一律會傳回值為 0 （零）。For other counter types, this overload always returns a value of 0 (zero).

summary.span: 計算兩個未經處理計數器樣本的已計算值。

span.span: Computes the calculated value of two raw counter samples.

returns.span: 效能計數器已計算值的浮點表示。

span.span: A floating-point representation of the performance counter's calculated value.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法多載來計算兩個原始計數器樣本的值。The following example demonstrates the use of the method overload to calculate the value of two raw counter samples. [!code-cpp[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/CPP/averagecount32.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/CS/averagecount32.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/VB/averagecount32.vb#1)]

exception.span: 計數器型別有效能資料協助程式 (PDH) 錯誤。

span.span: counter type has a Performance Data Helper (PDH) error.

exception.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱本文件之＜Win32 和 COM 程式開發＞章節中的＜檢查 PDH 介面傳回值＞。
